description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. "its say on set" is an traditional hand game in Japan. Players lead own thumb up/down and an attacker expects to match the total number of thumbs. "its-say-on-set" is the call of that timing. Multiplayer mode supports up to 4 players by Xbox LIVE.
description.short: "its say on set" is an traditional hand game in Japan. Players lead own thumb up/down and an attacker expects to match the total number of thumbs. "its-say-on-set" is the call of that timing. Multiplayer mode supports up to 4 players by Xbox LIVE.
